name: Zili Shao
content: Welcome to Zili Shao's Home Page Zili Shao Professor CSE, CUHK Shatin, Hong Kong Office: SHB 909 Email: shao at cse.cuhk.edu.hk Phone: (852) 39434258 About me I am a professor at Department of Computer Science and Engineering, The Chinese University of Hong Kong. I received my Ph.D. degree from Department of Computer Science, The University of Texas at Dallas. To prospective students: I am looking for undergraudate/graduate students with strong interests in big data systems, storage systems, embedded systems/software research. If you are interested, please send me email with your CV and transcripts.
